device.title: Name your VeeaHub
device.details: A default name has been given to the VeeaHub. If you like, you can change this to something more memorable and descriptive.

mesh.title: Name your mesh
mesh.details: Your VeeaHub operates in a "mesh" - a group of VeeaHubs working together. You can add more VeeaHubs to your mesh later or create a new mesh.
